_jira_custom_field_defaults_comment: Optional: Default values for custom fields used by your team (e.g., {"workstream": "Platform", "team": "Backend", "size": "M"}). Fields auto-discovered from JIRA.
_jira_comment_visibility_type_comment: Optional: Restrict comment visibility. Values: 'group' or 'role'. Leave null for public comments.
_jira_comment_visibility_value_comment: Optional: Group/role name for comment visibility (e.g., 'Developers', 'jira-users'). Required if type is set.
_time_tracking_enabled_comment: Enable automatic time tracking for sessions
